## Local() function

Inject a service for his utilization but with a context inside his module

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function Local(): (target: any, targetKey: string, index: number) => void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

(target: any, targetKey: string, index: number) =&gt; void
